en: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go unto the house of Jehovah.
hmr: “LALPA inah fêng ei tiu,” Ka kuoma an ti lai khan ka lâwm a.

en: Our feet are standing Within thy gates, O Jerusalem,
hmr: Aw Jerusalem, i kul kawtkhâr sûngah, Kan kehai chu a ngîr ta hi.

en: Jerusalem, that art builded As a city that is compact together;
hmr: Jerusalem, khawpui indin thar, Detindo taka rem chu.

en: Whither the tribes go up, even the tribes of Jehovah, For an ordinance for Israel, To give thanks unto the name of Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA hming inpâk dingin, Chutaka chun hnamhai chu an hang fe hlak, LALPA hnamhai chu, Israelhai kuoma thuinhriettirna dingin.

en: For there are set thrones for judgment, The thrones of the house of David.
hmr: Chutaka chun rorêlna dingin ṭhungphahai daw a ni sih a, David sûnghai lalṭhungphahai chu.

en: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: They shall prosper that love thee.
hmr: Jerusalem thlamuongna ding hnipêk ro, Nangma ngainatuhai chu thawveng an tih.

en: Peace be within thy walls, And prosperity within thy palaces.
hmr: I kul sûnga chun thlamuongna um sienla, I lal inhaia chun thawvengna um raw se.

en: For my brethren and companions’ sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
hmr: Ka unauhai le ka ruolhai leiin, “I sûngah thlamuongna um raw se,” tîng ka tih.

en: For the sake of the house of Jehovah our God I will seek thy good.
hmr: LALPA ei Pathien in lei chun, I ṭhatna ding zawng ka tih.
